meanings.definition: A title or term of respect for a leader or chief in India.
meanings.sent1: The villagers gathered to listen to the naik's wise words.
meanings.sent2: The naik of the tribe was highly respected by all.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully pretended to crown their friend as the naik of the playground.
meanings.sent4: In the school play, the student actor portrayed the naik with great dignity.
meanings.sent5: The naik's presence commanded attention and admiration from everyone.

meanings.sent1: The hikers began to naik the steep mountain trail.
meanings.sent2: She used the elevator to naik to the top floor of the building.
meanings.sent3: The balloon started to naik higher and higher into the sky.
meanings.sent4: His spirits started to naik as he saw the finish line in sight.
meanings.sent5: The airplane started to naik into the clouds, leaving the ground behind.

meanings.definition: A surname commonly found in India.
meanings.sent1: The naik family celebrated Diwali with joy and laughter.
meanings.sent2: Many people with the surname Naik live in the same neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, the Naik relatives shared stories and memories.
meanings.sent4: The Naik surname has a long history in the region.
meanings.sent5: Mr. Naik greeted his neighbors with a warm smile every morning.
